Article.ArticleTitle: TARGETing Transcriptional Regulation in the Medicinal Plant Catharanthus roseus.

AbstractText: Transcriptional regulation is a central piece of the highly valuable monoterpenoid indole alkaloid pathway of C. roseus , and the ultimate tool for its understanding and manipulation. Here, we describe the adaptation of the TARGET methodology to identify specific and genome-wide leaf targets of C. roseus candidate transcription factors (TFs).
